languages.text: "Покаянии? Он предатель! Дайте мне... Проклятье, если такова ваша воля, я не смею перечить".
"Penance? He is a traitor! Just allow me to... Throne damn it, I dare not protest your decision."
languages.original_text: "Покаянии? Он предатель! Дайте мне... Проклятье, если такова ваша воля, я не смею перечить".

traits.locale_text: "Penance? He is a traitor! Allow me to... Throne damn it, I dare not protest your decision."
"The man is a traitor and a heretic who has shown no sign of remorse. But if such is Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s will, I dare not object."
"Penance? He is a traitor! Allow me to... Throne damn it, I dare not protest your decision."

languages.text: « Quelle pénitence ? C'est un traître ! Avec votre permission, je... Au nom du Trône, je n'ose contester votre décision. »
languages.original_text: "Penance? He is a traitor! Just allow me to... Throne damn it, I dare not protest your decision."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle pénitence ? C'est un traître ! Avec votre permission, je... Au nom du Trône, je n'ose contester votre décision. »

languages.text: «¿Penitencia? ¡Pero si es un traidor! Déjeme que lo... Por el Trono, no me atrevo a protestar contra su decisión».
languages.original_text: "Penance? He is a traitor! Just allow me to... Throne damn it, I dare not protest your decision."

traits.locale_text: «¿Penitencia? ¡Pero si es un traidor! Déjeme que lo... Por el Trono, no me atrevo a protestar contra su decisión».

languages.text: “悔过？可他是个叛徒！您不如让我来……愿黄金王座诅咒他。我不敢质疑您的决定，大人。”
languages.original_text: "Penance? He is a traitor! Just allow me to... Throne damn it, I dare not protest your decision."

traits.locale_text: “悔过？可他是个叛徒！您不如让我来……愿黄金王座诅咒他。我不敢质疑您的决定，大人。”

languages.text: 「贖罪ですと？奴は裏切り者です！どうか私に…ああ、申し訳ございません。陛下の決定には抗議いたしません」
languages.original_text: "Penance? He is a traitor! Just allow me to... Throne damn it, I dare not protest your decision."

traits.locale_text: 「贖罪ですと？奴は裏切り者です！どうか私に…ああ、申し訳ございません。陛下の決定には抗議いたしません」

languages.text: "Buße? Er ist ein Verräter! Gestattet mir einfach ... Beim Thron, Eure Entscheidung ist Gesetz."
languages.original_text: "Penance? He is a traitor! Just allow me to... Throne damn it, I dare not protest your decision."

traits.locale_text: "Buße? Er ist ein Verräter! Gestattet mir einfach ... Beim Thron, Eure Entscheidung ist Gesetz."

languages.text: "Kefaret mi? Hainin teki o! Müsaade edin... Taht beni kahretsin, kararınıza karşı çıkmaya cüret edemem."
languages.original_text: "Penance? He is a traitor! Just allow me to... Throne damn it, I dare not protest your decision."
